name: INVADE (Pavan)
description:
Some creatures from another planet trying to invade earth, they have already conquered few parts of the earth. You're a part of an organization called PEACE your goal is to stop the invasion by killing their leader

KEY FEATURES

  • Third-person gameplay
  • Atmospheric graphics
  • Special effect attacks
  • Save data

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor 

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Storage: 500-600 MB available space
